snippet: American Greetings, the greeting card and “social expression” products company, said on Monday that it had agreed to be taken private by its founding family in a deal it valued at $878 million.
abstract: American Greetings, the greeting card and “social expression” products company, said on Monday that it had agreed to be taken private by its founding family in a deal it valued at $878 million.

headline.main: American Greetings to Be Taken Private
